outline:
1. to slip off, drop off, clear away, draw off
    1. (Qal)
      1. to slip or drop off
      2. to draw off
      3. to clear away
    2. (Piel) to clear out completely, clear entirely
kjv_def: cast (out), drive, loose, put off (out), slip.
strongs_def: to pluck off, i.e. divest, eject or drop
